page.title: 08RECREATION _BOATING
page.content: On Saturday July 6th 1985 my family and I went on our boat to sleep.My gran looked after Echo,who is my dog. We sailed our boat "Bizzizzi",to Falmouth Docks.Here outlined is the route we took_leaving Pandora Inn, down the Carrick Roads,past St. Mawes and on into Falmouth.We then did a return journey_altogether this took one and a half hours.Our boat is a Venturer with a blue strip around it. We eventually arrived home at 10 in the evening on that Sunday.Boating is great fun.I have been on a canal boating holiday in Wales,but I prefer our boat."Bizzizzi"is 22 feet long, has one mast and four berths.There is a boating lake in Perranporth but it is only for rowing boats.
